title: Wendy H. Reeve, M.D.
description: Dr. Wendy H. Reeve, M.D., is a Holistic Health Practitioner practicing in San Francisco, CA. See Doctor 's full profile and credentials.
sitename: Dr. Wendy H. Reeve M.D., Holistic Health Practitioner in San Francisco, CA
cleaned_text: Wendy H. Reeve, M.D. Holistic/Integrative Medicine Not accepting new patients Accepted Health Plans Below is a list of plans accepted by this doctor. While we strive to keep this list up to date, it's always a good idea to check with your health plan to determine the specific details of your coverage, and to contact the doctor's office to verify acceptance of your particular plan. Professional Interests Holistic/Integrative Medicine - Acupuncture, Acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine, Anti-inflammatory diets, Chinese herbs, Consultations, Detoxification programs, Diabetes, Functional medicine, Herbal medicine, Homeopathy, Integrative allergy treatment, Integrative autoimmune disorders care Affiliations - Hospital Affiliations - California Pacific Medical Center - - - - - Medical Affiliations - - Sutter Pacific Medical Foundation - Sutter West Bay Medical Group - - - - Sutter Medical Network Practice Locations Credentials & Notables - Medical School: - University of Arizona College of Medicine - Residency: - Oregon Health and Science University, Internal Medicine - Special Training: - Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine, Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine Languages - Primary Language(s) - English - Additional Language(s) - Spanish (Conversational) Publications [Hypothermia-Induced Hypokalemia](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33176124/) - Article - The American Journal of Medicine Yoshida H, Reeve W, Mansoor AM 11/8/2020 Community Activities American College of Physicians, American Medical Association, American College of Rheumatology, Physicians Committee for Responsible Medicine Personal Interests Practicing yoga, learning foreign languages, creating healthy recipes, playing the piano, walking in nature, supporting no-kill animal shelters Philosophy of Care I believe that good health is crucial to achieving one's optimal potential, and I like the World Health Organization's definition that "health is a state of complete mental, social and physical well-being, not merely the absence of disease or infirmity." There are many paths to health and wellness, and each person deserves an individualized approach to finding the path that works best for them. I believe in meeting patients wherever they are in the healing process and taking an integrative approach that includes both conventional and naturopathic medicine. Physicians Nearby [Aparna A.
